value:
Once the music starts and everyone's
all smiles and having fun, my body
will just start dancing on its own!

This festival is like a dream. In the
future I lived, spring celebrations like
this were just fireside stories!

Do you...think these eggs might hatch
into bugs? I'd sooner die loveless and
alone than see that happen!

Girls in bunny outfits as far as the eye
can see! This calls for a new opener.
Maybe... "Hey, what's hopping?"

Mother said the best way to conquer
shyness was to talk to girls.$k$pIf she could see how many girls I've
talked to here, she'd be SO proud!

If you have any tips on how to make
people stop trying to tug on these
ears, I'm all, um...ears.$k$pI've entirely lost count of how many
have tried. Maybe I shouldn't have
left $Nf's castle...

I've got to be strong if I want to show
ALL the girls around the festival!

I'm feeling a little extra spring
in my step!

I was distracted... I simply caught a
glimpse of a lovely maiden.

Oh my! This spring certainly is
warming up quickly!

My name is Inigo, and now that
spring has sprung... Um... S-stop
staring—I'm actually quite shy.

Thank you for asking me
here to the spring festival,
$Nu.$k$pI must admit, I wasn't sure about the
dress code. At first, I thought the ears
would be a little embarrassing...$k$pBut once I saw Princess Sharena and
Prince Alfonse enjoying theirs, I was
finally able to pluck up my courage.$k$pSometimes all it takes is a little
encouragement, don't you think?$k$pAhh! That's something I would have
loved to have told my late mother,
Olivia, were she still with me.$k$pActually, her younger self is here
in Askr, so I suppose I still have
the opportunity after all!$k$pPerhaps later! For now, I just want to
soak in the festival spirit...and maybe
try to talk to a few lucky ladies.
とうっ
これで！
ひゃあっ
Not bad...
Ah, springtime!
Wakey, wakey!
Let's have some fun!
How's this?
You cracked...my egg...
Haha
I know, I know. I look ridiculous.
HEY! I did NOT say you could pull the ears.
Spring is so full of cheer, it just makes me want to frolic!
Hey, it's spring—the season for smiles!
You think Mother would like some flowers? Maybe I should make her a bouquet.
The festival's got everyone in such good spirits, I might actually have a chance...
Your smile is as lovely as the springtime sun.
I'm ready.
Too comfy to move...
Hopping to it.
